citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The required paperwork, the written program of veterinary care, the list of animals on hand, and the contingency plan
were not available at time of inspection. Without this paperwork , we cannot verify compliance with The Act. Each
exhibitor shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the
regulations in this part.
To be corrected by close of business April 15,2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The required paperwork, the written program of veterinary care, the list of animals on hand,  and the contingency plan 
were not available at time of inspection. Without this paperwork , we cannot verify compliance with The Act. Each  
exhibitor shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the 
regulations in this part. 
To be corrected by close of business April 15,2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
